QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, hv_lab_test_dt, hv_enc_id, lab_test_loinc_cd, lab_result_nm, coalesce(lab_test_loinc_cd, '') || '_' || coalesce(lab_result_nm, '') as source, lab_result_uom, lab_result_msrmt, coalesce(lab_test_prov_id, '') || ';' || coalesce(lab_test_prov_taxnmy_id, '') ProviderIdKey from {sc}.emr_lab_test JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where upper(prmy_src_tbl_nm) in ( 'RESULTS' ) and lab_result_msrmt is not null and (lab_result_nm is not null OR lab_test_loinc_cd is not null) order by ch.person_id
